1681290.name: Full Moon
1681290.description:
Full Moon is an exploration and adventure game where you play as the Egyptian God Anubis. Discover all the mysteries of the ancient Pyramyd while fighting against the dark forces.
The path to proceed forward splits into many directions. Will you smash a wall to open up a secret passage? WIll you climb to the top with a series of precise jumps? Will you move platforms closer to you so you can cross them? Your decisions will forge your own adventure!

~FIGHT THEM WITH STYLE~


In your adventure you will find a lot of different skills with different properties. Chain them together to bring down even the strongest of foes!
The combo system rewards creativity and style!

~FUSE YOUR SKILLS~


Fusing two different skills will generate new unique abilities which may prove to be helpful when exploring the world. Experiment with all the various combinations and find the playstyle that suits you better!

~EXPLORE THE ANCIENT PYRAMYD~


Your skills allow you to break walls, move platforms, bun obstacles, and much more! Lose yourself in a vast and interconnected Pyramyd, full of secrets and hidden areas!

∼ Features ∽
  • Action packed side-scrolling in a retro pixel art style, mixed with modern effects
  • Sharp and precise character movement and attack abilities
  • Combat system with multiple options and combo routes
  • Heavy focus on exploration in a typical metroidvania style
  • Hand-drawn pixel art brought to life with frame-by-frame animation
  • A large, interconnected world with secrets, enemies, and ominous deities
1681290.supported_languages:
英语*, 意大利语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
